ygData.subject: Answers...sorta
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/22/99 5:18:23 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... You can find the answers to all that and more on EQ lizer at: http://gameznet.com/eq/
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/22/99 5:18:23 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
warriors_eq@onelist.com writes:

> Jiya guys. Just some questions. I heard that there are two centaurs in the
> Centaur Village in South Karana at 200, -2400 that offer Blue Plate or
> "Crafted", and that it is Warrior Only armor. Does anyone know what items
> you need to give and what the stats are? Also any magic on it? Any info
> appreciated!
>
> Anyone know where to find the Electrum-Bladed Wakizashi? And maybe how much
> it sells for from PCs.

You can find the answers to all that and more on EQ'lizer at:
http://gameznet.com/eq/
